alert.note: Alert for McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 11:55PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McPherson County through 130 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Venturia, or 12 miles north of Eureka, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Town Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
